title: PRICE DROP!! Awesome Remodel in Great Condition (Mt. Baker Railway)
posting_body: ['Awesome Remodel in Great Condition (Mt. Baker Railway)', 'Property Address', '3320 Claremont Ave S Unit 2 | Seattle, WA 98144-6801', 'Available: 09/03/2022', 'Offered By', 'Lakeshore Corporation', 'Description', 'Enjoy an alternative lifestyle with all the diversity and cultural richness that the south end of Seattle has to offer in this awesome two bedroom unit.', 'This 900 sq.', 'ft. unit boats 2 full bedrooms that are fully remodeled with designer touches!', 'You will love the granite counter tops, updated paint and recently finished dark oak floors.', 'Plus updated bathroom fixtures with contemporary concrete floors and programmable thermostats in every room to save energy and $$$!', 'Unreserved parking is available on property and street parking available!', 'SCHEDULE SHOWINGS @', 'https://showdigs.co/f1JNlW', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent: $2,095', 'Fully Refundable Deposit: $1,800', 'Lease Term: 12 Months', 'Tenants responsible for all utilities', 'No smoking and no pets (no exceptions), please.', '*$49 non-refundable application fee per each applicant age 18 and older.', 'Key Words: Seattle, Mt Baker, North Beacon Hill, Rainier Vista, I-5, I-90, Lakeshore.', 'Amenities', 'Walking distance to QFC - Safeway -Asian and ethnic grocery stores', '15 minute walk to Rainier Square Plaza', '15 Minute walk to Safeway-TMobile-Radio Shack - Taco Bell  - Magic Dragon', 'Easy Access to I-5 & I-90', 'Less than 1 mile to Columbia City - 3 min by car or Metro Route #7', 'Free Parking!!', 'Excellent Mass Transit Options', 'Walking distance to Mt. Baker Railway Station', 'Close to Light Rail to get to Downtown - Chinatown - Stadiums - Pioneer Sqaure - University District - Easy Access to Airport', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 900', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,095.00', 'Available: 09/03/2022', 'Application Fee: $49.00', 'Security Deposit: $1,800.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats not allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
